1: <pb/><t>Re' hin ma' k'insiin ta nsuuqb'ik nuk'ux</t> <t>noq kinkik'am reje parupaat i QaJaaw Dios.</t>
2: <t>Eh yu'naak i hoj wilkooj chik chi chii'</t> <t>i ookb'al reh i tinamit Jerusaleem.</t>
3: <t>Re' Jerusaleem xkorb'eesjik reh chi ar</t> <t>naakimolom kiib' pan jinaj wach k'uxliis i tinamit chulooq'jiik i QaJaaw Dios.</t>
4: <t>Eh ar naa kojiik jar ch'uq taqe i aj Israel</t> <t>chut'iosjiik i rotob'il i Dios,</t> <t>je' rukab' i xq'orarik keh pampeet.</t>
5: <t>Ar wo' pan tinamit Jerusaleem</t> <t>wilik i kiye'aab' inki a'n wii' i q'ataj q'orik taqe i ruk'u'liil i reey David.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Chapahqaaj taq chi wih-oq pansuqkiil k'uxliis i Jerusaleem.</t> <t>Eh nee ta naq kielik korik i kik'axwik taq aweh.</t>
7: <t>Neeta naq inwihik i suq kiil k'uxliis chupaam taq aatinamiit.</t> <t>Eh ma' ta naq chih neen kik'ul pan kiye'aab' taqe awaj taaq'oom.</t>
8: <t>Ruum chi nuk'ax i nutinamiit, taqe i wamigo, naa nupahqaam reh i QaJaaw Dios</t> <t>chi wih-oq i suq kiil k'uxliis Jerusaleem.</t>
9: <t>Eh ruum chi q'e' nuk'ax i rupaat QaJaaw Dios</t> <t>naa nupahqaam ree reh chi naa rutoob'eem i nutinamiit.</t>
